title: Rani Pink Kundan Polki Jhumka - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas showcase intricate Kundan setting with vibrant Ruby and Emerald enameling. The Polki diamonds are carefully hand-set to maximize their brilliance. The design is a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian temple jewelry with a modern aesthetic, featuring a classic jhumka shape adorned with delicate pearl drops. Notice the fine craftsmanship in the open setting which allows light to pass through the Polki diamonds, enhancing their natural sparkle.
colors: Pearl (cream). This is a traditional and auspicious color palette for South Indian jewelry.
occasions: and festive occasions like Sankranti and Ugadi. Their timeless elegance also makes them suitable for upscale parties and cultural events.
description: These Jhumkas are a true heirloom piece, blending traditional South Indian design with exceptional craftsmanship. The use of high-quality Kundan Polki diamonds and genuine gemstones ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish provides superior shine and durability, making them a worthy investment for generations to come. Their unique color combination and exquisite details will undoubtedly make you stand out at any occasion.
